short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension translates deeker into english.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A quick translation extension for translating the Berkeley slang, referred to here as 'Deeker', into normal english. Text on the current page can be translated as well as inputted text.
